para.text: PEST also requires that observations be assigned to observation groups so now we need to define the observation groups. We do this in the
pane. All you need to do is to specify the names of the observation groups.

image.title: Screen capture illustrating the definition of the observation groups.
image.caption: Screen capture illustrating the definition of the observation groups.

para.text: Next go to the Obseration group assignments tab and select all the head observations. You can select them by clicking on the first one, holding the shift key down and then clicking on the last one. Then click down on one of them again and while holding the mouse button down, drag the cursor to the Heads group and releasing the mouse. Assign the other two observations to the CHD and comparison groups respectively.
